alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:36AM MST until January 21 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Lincoln, Lyon, Murray and Pipestone Counties. In South Dakota, Brookings County. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility in open areas. Visibility and road conditions may rapidly change over short distances. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow may lead to icy roads.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
